column1: Symons British Rainfall 1892 lists this at Noirmont
Symons British Rainfall 1893 lists this at St Aubins
No info to narrow down which month so split made in Jan 1893
I read that it was only a small move to the station platform but it dropped from 270ft elevation to 35ft
270ft unlikely as a long way from Noirmont so selected highest point in Noirmont at 225ft
